articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Macron vs Le Pen: France votes in tense presidential runoff - 9News
articles.description: France began voting in a presidential runoff election with repercussions for Europe's future.

articles.title: Danish study finds superbug C. difficile can jump between pigs and humans, providing evidence of zoonotic spread - EurekAlert
articles.description:
**Note: this is a press release from the European Congress of Clinical Microbiology & Infectious Diseases (ECCMID 2022, Lisbon, 23-26 April). Please credit the congress if you use this story**

articles.content: A study investigating samples of the superbug Clostridioides difficile across 14 pig farms in Denmark finds the sharing of multiple antibiotic-resistance genes between pigs and human patients, provid… [+6087 chars]

articles.title: EU regulator backs using Pfizer COVID-19 shot as booster after other vaccines - CNA
articles.description:
A European Medicines Agency (EMA) committee on Friday (Apr 22) recommended approving the use of Pfizer and BioNTech's COVID-19 vaccine, Comirnaty, as a booster for adults who have previously been inoculated with other vaccines.
